alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Frost Advisory issued September 11 at 8:55PM CDT until September 12 at 8:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM CDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. * WHERE...Koochiching, North St. Louis, Northern Cook and Lake, North Itasca and Central St. Louis Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bois Forte Band, Deer Creek, Nett Lake and, Lake Vermilion areas. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 8 AM CDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation if left uncovered. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Frost is most likely to develop in low- lying areas. Other spots may see frost on rooftops while ground temperatures remain just above freezing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
